text: Elena Kagan (born April 28, 1960) is an American lawyer and judge. She is a United States Supreme Court Justice. She was confirmed by the United States Senate on August 5, 2010. She is one of four women on the court. Kagan is the only Supreme Court Justice who had never been a judge before becoming a Justice. Before being a Justice, she was Solicitor General and dean of Harvard Law School. Kagan was born and raised in New York City and is Jewish.Obama picks Kagan as Justice nominee ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Jewish American academics Category:Jewish judges Category:Jewish lawyers Category:People from Manhattan Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States Solicitors General Category:United States Supreme Court justices Category:Educators from New York City
title: Elena Kagan
